name: Darker Google
description:
Google redesigned in dark Grays, custom images, gradients, advanced CSS3 effects and more. 

For web designs, check out https://www.zigboom.com
additional_info:
Bug reports & support: https://www.zigboom.com

This style affects most of Google Services (search, Images etc.) and does not affect a few services (Calendar, Maps, Analytics etc.), that's by design. Please contact us if you found any issues with the styled services. 

Matching Styles: 

Darker Facebook - https://userstyles.org/styles/100480/darker-facebook

Darker YouTube - https://userstyles.org/styles/50852/darker-youtube
